Title: Relates to requiring employers to provide a reasonable accommodation to employees who have children who are unable to return to a childcare provider as a result of a pandemic
Summary: Requires employers to provide a reasonable accommodation to employees who have children who are unable to return to a childcare provider as a result of a pandemic and is unable to maintain their normal work schedule.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring employers to provide a reasonable accommodation to employees who have children who are unable to return to a childcare provider as a result of a pandemic
